<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/tenants/{tenant_id}/configs"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Update tenant-specific configuration settings

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"tenant_id","required":true,"in":"path","description":"Tenant ID","schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"key":{"type":"string","description":"Configuration key","example":"max_points_per_transaction"},"value":{"type":"string","description":"Configuration value","example":"1000"}},"title":"UpdateConfigsDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Settings updated successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"key":{"type":"string","description":"Configuration key","example":"max_points_per_transaction"},"value":{"type":"string","description":"Configuration value","example":"1000"}},"title":"UpdateConfigsDto"}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - Invalid settings data"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"500":{"description":"Internal Server Error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
